original_body_lines: It was reported that 26 passengers have been hospitalised after a bus veered off the road and toppled down a precipice while on its way to the Nelligala International Buddhist Centre, the police said.
The bus was coming from Moratuwa with around 47 passengers on board at the time of accident.
They said several passengers were admitted to the Kandy General hospital.
The accident took place around 1.30 pm. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
